Help

Studios help (Professor Ransford)

Ask for guidance that stays inside the selected studio, and generate copy‑paste examples you can save to a file and upload.

Studio expert assistant

Scope: Studios (general). I will only answer inside this scope: Navigation, safe usage, and choosing the right studio for your goal.

Ask a question

If your question is outside this studio, I will refuse and suggest where to go instead.

Generate an uploadable example

You’ll get files you can copy/paste or download as real files for upload.
